Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Qianjing Yingshi is dedicated to the production of corporate advertising and promotional videos, providing clients with precise video marketing solutions. With 16 years of development, the company has accumulated over 1,300 case studies across eight major industries, establishing itself as a strategy-oriented boutique film and advertising company. Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Promotional video and advertising video materials
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
Prepping data for Filecoin is straightforward: First, pack your data into a CAR file (a format built for IPLD), then generate its Piece CID and CAR file CID—these act like unique fingerprints. Next, use lotus client deal to propose a storage deal, splitting the CAR file into "pieces" (properly sized chunks, aligned to powers of two). Once a miner accepts, the data gets transferred via P2P, and the deal finalizes on-chain.

TL;DR: Pack → hash → split → propose → transfer. Keep an eye on the CommP (data’s unique ID) and Deal ID, or you might lose track.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe, Australia (continent)
